level.text: A license issued pursuant to this chapter shall be effective for not more than two years and shall expire at 12:00 midnight on January 31st of each odd-numbered year. The Director of the Department of Health may establish a different term and expiration date, by rule.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7282 (September 17, 1999).
